Name: Jatin Sanghvi
Title: Good hangout spot with family...
Review: Apart from the clock tower which is centre of attraction, the park is otherwise spacious, has a good walking track, lawns, 2 skating arenas, children play area, 2 tiny lakes.  In evenings, you can spot a colony of bats perching on a tree in the eastern side of the park.

Name: Helen
Title: Outdoor concert venue
Review: Easy access. Spacious. Lakes, trees, seating, walking, tower for a wide view of the city  and a lovely outdoor stage and seating for excellent performances.

Name: #amosamiyanayeküéß
Title: üë£
Review: very close to my office so i never missed the just just to in ... greenish areas such a awesome for jogging walking and skating‚õ∑Ô∏è ! best spot to hangout with children as well as adults the main attraction in the towerüóº

Name: Nanthakumar Ganesan
Title: Good for walkers and children
Review: Having very good environment to walk.. 1 round will come around 1.5 km.. Having more space with lake.. Having more slides, swings

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Big park in the heart of the city
Review: Annagar Park is a big park in the heart of the city. It's really great to build a park in such a big commercial area. This park is close to Ayyappan Koyal (Ayyappa Swami Temple). The best thing about the park is it has a very big tower üóº. This tower attracts most of the visitors. Overall its a must visit place for kids and parents too. You can enjoy walking in the park.

Name: Lijo
Title: 1968 tower
Review: A park for all with a tower in the Centre built in 1968.Though the tower is closed for public. Park is still assessable. A place to spent ur evening leisure time if u happen to be in Chennai

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: famous among the locals
Review: This is one of the place which is mostly sorted by the locals all through the  day, for their walking,playing,yoga,mingling with friends and neighbours, and the happening place in the city.

Name: Melissa Dsouza
Title: Tower
Review: This place is a garden to relax and there is a tower and a huge garden there which can  visited by family and friends.

Name: Narasimhan G
Title: Extra ordinary maintenance
Review: I know the Local MLA there. Place is full of people mainly because of the rich neighbourhood and the responsible population thereChildren are taught skating.Parents and kids enjoy skating , park and the Anna Nagar Tower !!Lily pond is of a great size.. You can spot turtles which eat popcorn thrown by the visitors !!

Name: Shaji Joseph
Title: good place to visit
Review: There is a long walk way across the park which is well maintained. Also can climb to the top of the tower which will give  long view of Anna Nagar area.

Name: Dinesh T
Title: Energy Redefining Park
Review: Love is this park, as this is one of the best place to relax and calm down our self. Visit this place for a walk, exercise or take your kids for play

Name: Arjun
Title: Good place for couples,friends,family and old age people.
Review: Tower park is the best place which is suited for all people. It is the best place to go with friends, family.it is also a good place for couples.kids can also enjoy here .so it is good place for all.

Name: Ramya S
Title: Relax
Review: Anna nagar tower park is a nice place to relax. There are many rides for children. we have exercise for grownups and it is spacious to walk around the park.

Name: diva k
Title: Poor maintenance
Review: I have been to this place after so many years, The maintenance is pathetic and they dont allow to go the top of the tower. T

Name: Prathitha S
Title: The Tower oh Happiness
Review: The Anna Nagar Tower is perhaps the oldest landmark here. It still has its old charm of being the most serene parks in the neighbourhood where people of all ages. The walking track reverberates with soulful melodies of Tamil film songs which makes walking the most delightful activity of the day. The gardens and fountains attract large crowds. The trees make the place very pleasant even during the hottest summer days of Chennai. The Park boasts of a good Skating rink and a meditation point too. Kids have their best times in the park here and remember their time spent here for the he rest of their lives just the way I do.

Name: Sarath Babu S
Title: Good place to hang out
Review: If you‚Äôre looking for a place to spend some quality time with our family & friends especially in the heart of the city, this is the place to go to.Anna Nagar Tower Park, as the name implies has the Tower & Park for you to walk/jog. It also has an open theatre. There are lot of snack shops just outside the compound but please ensure that the place doesn‚Äôt get untidy with all those spillovers. The park is real huge with lot of trees/plants & is ideal for a Morning/evening jog/walk.

Name: Rajeshkumar C
Title: Visit to Annanagar tower park
Review: During 2000 to 2005 I have been a regular visitor to Anna nagar tower park with my friends on weekends. After switching over to IT and job in OMR it's been long time I have forgotten this place.Recently our friends and family wanted to have a meet near Anna nagar and the first place that came to my mind is Tower park. On Friendship day , We visited the Tower park with few friends and their families. Wow,entering the park,  I really had a different feeling of meeting an lovely old friend. Tower park has lot of green covers and large spaces for visitors. Being a Sunday we could witness lot of sports in action. Lot of kids were enjoying their time in multiple small play areas. Some of us scaled the Tower peak to have a lovely view of the city. Lot of eatery shops were available around the tower park , particularly at the entrance. For the safety of the visitors, police patrolling has been put in place. Really a refreshing evening and loved the Park .

Name: K R
Title: Nice park
Review: It located heart of Anna Nagar near rountana.  It is wonderful  for time passing and attractive place .

Name: sridharan2013
Title: A well maintained garden with a landmark tower in the midst
Review: Anna Nagar tower is a famous landmark in Chennai and the authorities have built a nice garden with large trees and landscape around it. Garden is very well maintained and is a boon for the people. There is scope for more facilities for visitors. Facilities for children amusement is available.

Name: Ghiri T
Title: Most visited Site
Review: Anna Nagar Tower Park is located near Anna Nagar roundtanna Chennai. This place is well maintained by the Chennai Corp.Many people come here to do exercise and to spend time with their loved ones. this place is famous around the locality. The tower is placed in the center of the park but it is restricted for the public to enter the tower.I used to go there with my friends to spend some time in the evening Overall it was a great experience.

Name: Sagarcak
Title: Excercise
Review: Very good park for joggers, warming ups. Very interactive place.very good place in the city which we can spend time .

Name: Abdul wahaab
Title: Chilling evening with nature
Review: It's a quite good mainted park inside the hot city . Lot of people visits this place daily kids couples family joggers employees to chill out their stresses and have a get-together .. love this place with mild music being played from the tower and fountain arrangements near tower is gud

Name: clementwill
Title: The Marina of AnnaNagar
Review: This precious lung space in Anna Nagar is one of the biggest blessings of the area. This is probably the largest park in Anna Nagar at present and attracts people of all ages from children to pensioners who all find something to do in this lovely park. There are enough play equipment to keep children occupied though some are in terrible shape due to poor maintenance, there are also exercise equipment which attract large crowds. The pebble tracks and the walking lanes are usually full of people in the morning and evening.A good space to spend time with known people or simply alone in Anna Nagar and its completely free!

Name: Rucha121
Title: Anna Tower
Review: While visiting our relatives in Anna Nagar, we made it a point to spend atleast 1 hour playing in Anna Nagar Tower Park. It had small lawn and benches for elderly people to sit and chat. Small children would merrily play around the trees and fountain. Hope they maintain it well and more garden and lawn space is added and landscape can be more beautiful and needs good maintenance.

Name: Mansoor A
Title: Nice place to hang around
Review: Good for kids, couples! singles please refrain üòä. Parking is available...lots of refreshments near the entrance....Can spend some 2 hours that's it...

Name: S A
Title: Good place for morning walk
Review: It's a very good place to start the day with a peaceful walk. The outer ring is approx 1km distance. Neat and clean.  Well maintained park. Lots of sitting places inside the park.

Name: Dilip Kumar
Title: A bustling park with greenery , skating, dancing, martial arts, walking etc..
Review: In the center of the posh Anna nagar - there lies this park offering bunch of activities -1. Greenery - with proper path ways for joggers2. Kids play areas - with swings, see-saw, skids etc. Some broken - but overall ok.3. Bushes, benches and lawns for teenage couples.4. Skating ring - where kids practice skating and its a delight to see5. Dance classes - hip hop6. Martial art classes7. A big tower with steps - but doors locked. Had it would been opened  the view would be great from top up there.8....Its a good place for people to relax and for kids to play.  It is an ideal place to chill for people in and around annanagar. Those who want their kids to learn skating - it looks like an ideal place. It is a very good park but not a tourist attraction.

Name: worldwomantourist
Title: Good place to relax
Review: Anna Nagar Tower park is located in Anna nagar area. Very famous among the local residents who come there to relax. Many kids get a good place to play and to enjoy their play time with friends. Many old people come here to relax and to share their feelings and thoughts with their friends and relatives.

Name: Arun
Title: One of the biggest parks in Chennai
Review: I have been to this place more than thrice and it has always been a good place to hang out with friends/GF. The main attraction is the tower and now a days they don‚Äôt allow to access the tower since some have tried to commit suicide and do some anti-social activities. However, you can click pictures of the tower and hangout near the tower.

Name: RAMAKRISHNAN K
Title: Walkers paradise in midst of Anna nagar
Review: The park is close to Aiyappan temple on 2nd avenue ..The park can also be approached from any sides of Anna Nagar easily.The activity starts early morning itself and you will find yoga club, laughing group, serious walkers, holly walkers with lots of health quotient around the gates.These include medical test for BP and sugar test etcSome vegetables can also be bought here our side the gate Nice skating ground ,,, children play area ,, But Sunday is crowded.. in the evenings

Name: Sarma_nvny
Title: Good one to spend time with family
Review: Accessibility and safety with plenty of space for relaxing, kids playing area, walkers track, big tower only to see from outside, fountains, skating ring, spend a good time.

Name: SagarVS
Title: Oasis
Review: In a crowded polluted concrete jungle such large green parks are a treat to the eye. Popular with locals and hundreds walk around the track in the park. Many catch up here socially. There is a huge tower here built in the 1960s but no one is allowed to go up. The place is seriously crowded in the morning and the evening. While people go here wanting peace, the park plays loud music from 6 am to 9 am which is a huge irritation.

Name: Ra_Radha
Title: Tower Garden
Review: Located in the neighborhood of Anna Nagar is the iconic Anna Nagar Tower and the children's park/ garden. Many kids come and play here in evening and senior citizens or women gather to take a walk and share a lighter moments. nice place to relax.

Name: Joji J
Title: "right place for morning walk and to spend evenings"
Review: The Tower Park at Anna Nagar is a right place where we can spend time or relax in the evening breathing fresh oxygen and kids have choice for various activities. The park has everthing to make us relax -The walk way around the park, the lake, the plants and trees in the park, kids play area, benches to sit and relax, the huge watch tower, rest room etc. The authorities have managed to maintain the park well and I have been to the park several times with friends to spend some time enjoying the great atmosphere.

Name: vikasmardia
Title: anna nagar tower park
Review: Tower park having variety of activities like skating rink and very big area for walkers. Also has a bathroom for convenience. A must for all anna nagarites

Name: Mansi Reddy
Title: Great activities for all age groups
Review: The towers park always makes me nostalgic.  In most cases the place is built and then a tower, but in Anna Nagar The tower was first made and then the neighborhood developed.  Because there are activities for all age groups it is visited by thousands of people every day. There is a great place to walk, run, playground for kids, benches to relax etc. A visit with family or friends is always enjoyable.

Name: Karthik V
Title: Evening walk
Review: This is my second visit here to this tower park after nearly 15 years. Although i didnt climb the tower all the way up this time around, i took a short stroll around the park. On a visit to a relatives house nearby, my curiosity to see this tower again brought me in this time. Now its well developed neatly maintained with lots of walker and children who want to spend a clean evening in this park. Good plale always.

Name: Karthick D
Title: Maintenance perfect
Review: Perfect place walking, relaxation,yoga, children's entertainment place, very safety like child and girls,very peaceful place.

Name: Abdul wahaab
Title: Awsme park to have gettogether with frnds
Review: Gud place to visit during evening which is located in the centre of the busy city ..park maintenace and cleanliness is gud ..lot of peoples visiting daily to spend time woth frnds and family Sports court is also available for indoor games lover but played outside One of the best park to do photo shoot ..

Name: cool1960
Title: RELAXING PLACE FOR ALL AGES
Review: Very neatly maintained. A big park. Cars have to be parked at the side roads available, which is there.The walking places are well tiled. Lots of benches are there for all of us to sit. Lots of Kids playing items are there, lots of mini exercising items are there. Worth spending a good time there.

Name: Ramprasad b
Title: Good park for Walks and Jogging
Review: This park is known as TOWER PARK for locals.  This park is located at center of Anna Nagar near Ayyappan Temple close to 2nd and 3rd Avenue Junction. I visit this park at least two times a week for morning walks. The walkway for walking and jogging along the perimeter of park is about 1.4 KM.  All the walkways are paved and mostly evenly leveled. A well maintained 2 to 3 acres lake is present in the park. This lake had water through out the year in the last five years since I was visiting the park.  In the park many play zone are present for children. Park was severely affected during the Dec. 2016 "Varadh" cyclone that uprooted and broke many well grown trees. Park management has done a very good job of clearing the fallen trees and broken branches in less than ten days to make the park usable again.A tall Observation Tower constructed in mid 1960s for an international trade fare is present at center of the park. This tower is well maintained but closed for public to go up due to a few attempts for suicides Best time to use the park for walking and jogging is mornings as the park gets crowded in the evenings with children and casual visitors. There is no entry fee or parking fee for using this park.

Name: Mohanathan V
Title: Gud place to fresh breeze
Review: This place is located very close to Anna nagar ayyappa temple. Campus is filled with trees. Vast space with more children play things, sitouts, skating area and fountain. Now its not allowed to enter the tower entrance

Name: Jothilingam E
Title: Nice park for all age
Review: Superb location for spending time not only for children but for all ages.You will enjoy park with kids.Dont forget to visit nearby Iyappan temple to offer prayers.

Name: vignesh d
Title: A Big park
Review: It is the biggest park in Chennai(If i'm not wrong) situated in Anna nagar, near to Aiyyapan temple. Its a large area to jog around, lake inside it, place to play shuttle, play area for kids, scatting place and the main attraction is the tower but it is closed because of some stupids committed suicide from it, otherwise it offers the great city view from the top.

Name: ArunaSrinivas
Title: Very good park!
Review: Well maintained park in the busy neighborhood of Anna nagar. Very crowded on holidays and weekends. Kids love to play on all the swings, slides...  There is a skating rink too.

Name: chaithanya12
Title: Good park in a busy area
Review: Anna nagar has full of commercial spaces and now the Tower Park is indeed one spot where you can sit and relax. Well suited for people who want to take a walk or jog. There are also various sports activities conducted inside the park which might interest you and summer classes for kids

Name: Syed H
Title: Beautiful and well maintained
Review: The park is a good example of how an ideal park in a residential locality should be ..greenery, channel music, great tower, skating arena, benches to relax,  no littering, fountain etc. .keep up the good work on maintenance. .

Name: kabilan k
Title: Park For Walkers
Review: Inside a busy area of anna nagar, there is a place with more trees and fresh air. Inside a park there is an artificial pond. This park best suits for early morning walking. I used to go there for walking and do some yoga and breathing exercises. And many awareness programmes also takes place here. The park name is Dr. Visveswaraya Tower Park   due to the tall tower like structure which was built in 1968, which was iconic and became a popular place and simply called as tower park.

Name: Aswathy J
Title: Neat!!
Review: A neat,well maintained park. Entry to the tower is restricted though. Great place for a nice long walk. There's a park for the kids. They also have a nice little pond.

Name: Nina S
Title: An much desired green oasis in the midst of the city
Review: The Tower Park is an iconic landmark of Anna Nagar itself. Its great to visit during the early mornings for a breath of fresh air during your morning walk/jog.  Visit in the evenings along with your family members especially kids. There is lots of place to walk leisurely having a chat.  Watch the fountains around the Tower, although access to the top of the tower is restricted and enjoy the bustling noises of the people around. Kids would be busy with the play equipment set up in several areas within the park. Bring along their skates, scooters and bicycles... this is the best place to put them to use.

Name: Arogya Raj
Title: Breezy air
Review: Neat and clean. Morning and evening are good time to visit . Lots of  fun for Children's. Good time pass for all. Make a run, jog all you want. Good place to make meaningful conversations with your loved ones. Watch the kids skate ,play and practice their dance moves.

Name: helpothers2016
Title: Excellent park
Review: well maintained, big park, fully crowded with a mix of people from all sections. car park is bit difficult. lot of side shop eatery is available.

Name: Rajesh C
Title: A breadth of fresh air!
Review: A great place to relax in the midst of the concrete jungle. A well planned and neat park in the center of anna nagar. It has got something for everyone. Walking / Jogging tracks. Volley ball nets, shuttle nets, cricket, yoga, skating, boating, Open air theater, kids play area, etc... etc... to name a few. Its always crowded and why not? One round on the walking track is approx 1 km. Early morning and late evenings are great times to be in the park. Soft music is played to encourage the patrons to do their exercises.Dont miss the laughing club oldies who generally seem to be having a ball in the mornings on almost all days.

Name: Ramesh K
Title: Superb
Review: Awesome place to visit with family . Natural, playful , learning full place Children were learning skating. By seeing them we can also enjoy And play ......We enjoyed the play area because I am a kid .their were 2 play areas, which were very large..........We can visit the park for our health ...How ???? By walking.........totally I enjoyed a lot ..............

Name: Muguncjb
Title: Surprisingly clean and some how green
Review: There is no entry fee for this park. Yet the park is privately maintained almost very clean and sufficient green with several trees around.  The park has benches below trees so that people can sit in hot sunny days too yet enough shadow is there.  Lot of children play activities are there including skating.  The tower located in the middle of the park has path to go to top but it is closed for entry.  For local people its good time pass for about an hour any time in day in the park so as for any visitors.  However can't say a must attraction for visitors from out of Chennai.
